sentences.sContent: The boss dropped an accountant from the payroll.
sentences.sContent_eng: The boss dropped an accountant from the payroll.
sentences.sCn: 老板把一名会计师从在职人员名单中除了名。

sentences.sContent: The accountant checked this unnecessary spending in good time.
sentences.sContent_eng: The accountant checked this unnecessary spending in good time.
sentences.sCn: 会计及时卡住了这笔不必要的开支。

sentences.sContent: They conferred with the accountant vis-à-vis the proposed budget.
sentences.sContent_eng: They conferred with the accountant vis-à-vis the proposed budget.
sentences.sCn: 他们与会计商量有关预算提案的事。

phrases.pCn: 总会计师；会计主任，会计处长
注册会计师；会计师；特许会计师
注册会计师；审定会计师
初级会计师；助理会计员

words.tran: 会计工作；会计学；会计师之职

trans.tranOther: someone whose job is to keep and check financial accounts, calculate taxes etc
